trans-unit.source: Deactivate and delete a StorSimple device | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Deactivate and delete a StorSimple device | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Describes how to remove StorSimple device from service by first deactivating it and then deleting it.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to remove StorSimple device from service by first deactivating it and then deleting it.

trans-unit.source: Deactivate and delete a StorSimple device
trans-unit.target: Deactivate and delete a StorSimple device

trans-unit.source: This tutorial explains how to remove a StorSimple device from service by deactivating it and then deleting it.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial explains how to remove a StorSimple device from service by deactivating it and then deleting it.

trans-unit.source: You must deactivate a device before you can delete it.
trans-unit.target: You must deactivate a device before you can delete it.

trans-unit.source: Deactivate a device
trans-unit.target: Deactivate a device

trans-unit.source: You may wish to take a device out of service.
trans-unit.target: You may wish to take a device out of service.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the device will need to be deactivated.
trans-unit.target: In this case, the device will need to be deactivated.

trans-unit.source: Deactivating severs the connection between the device and the corresponding StorSimple Manager service.
trans-unit.target: Deactivating severs the connection between the device and the corresponding StorSimple Manager service.

trans-unit.source: Deactivation is a PERMANENT operation and cannot be undone.
trans-unit.target: Deactivation is a PERMANENT operation and cannot be undone.

trans-unit.source: A deactivated device cannot be registered with the StorSimple Manager service unless it is first reset by the factory.
trans-unit.target: A deactivated device cannot be registered with the StorSimple Manager service unless it is first reset by the factory.

trans-unit.source: When you deactivate a device, any data that was stored locally on the device will no longer be accessible.
trans-unit.target: When you deactivate a device, any data that was stored locally on the device will no longer be accessible.

trans-unit.source: Only the data associated with the device that was stored in the cloud can be recovered.
trans-unit.target: Only the data associated with the device that was stored in the cloud can be recovered.

trans-unit.source: Once deactivated, a device needs to be factory reset before it can be reused with an existing or a new service.
trans-unit.target: Once deactivated, a device needs to be factory reset before it can be reused with an existing or a new service.

trans-unit.source: The factory reset process deletes all the data that was stored locally on your device.
trans-unit.target: The factory reset process deletes all the data that was stored locally on your device.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is essential that you take a cloud snapshot of all your data before you deactivate a device.
trans-unit.target: Therefore, it is essential that you take a cloud snapshot of all your data before you deactivate a device.

trans-unit.source: This will allow you to recover all the data at a later stage.
trans-unit.target: This will allow you to recover all the data at a later stage.

trans-unit.source: For a StorSimple virtual device, deactivation deletes the virtual machine and the resources created when it was provisioned.
trans-unit.target: For a StorSimple virtual device, deactivation deletes the virtual machine and the resources created when it was provisioned.

trans-unit.source: After the virtual device is deactivated, it cannot be restored to its previous state.
trans-unit.target: After the virtual device is deactivated, it cannot be restored to its previous state.

trans-unit.source: Before you deactivate a StorSimple virtual device, make sure to stop or delete clients and hosts that depend on that virtual device.
trans-unit.target: Before you deactivate a StorSimple virtual device, make sure to stop or delete clients and hosts that depend on that virtual device.

trans-unit.source: Deactivate and delete data
trans-unit.target: Deactivate and delete data

trans-unit.source: If you are interested in deleting the device completely and do not want to retain the device data, then do the following:
trans-unit.target: If you are interested in deleting the device completely and do not want to retain the device data, then do the following:

trans-unit.source: Prior to deactivating a device, you must delete all the volume containers (and the volumes) associated with the device.
trans-unit.target: Prior to deactivating a device, you must delete all the volume containers (and the volumes) associated with the device.

trans-unit.source: You can only delete volume containers after you have deleted the associated backups.
trans-unit.target: You can only delete volume containers after you have deleted the associated backups.

trans-unit.source: Deactivate the device.
trans-unit.target: Deactivate the device.

trans-unit.source: Go to <link><linkText>Steps to deactivate</linkText><title></title></link> for instructions.
trans-unit.target: Go to <link><linkText>Steps to deactivate</linkText><title></title></link> for instructions.

trans-unit.source: After deactivation, you can delete the device completely.
trans-unit.target: After deactivation, you can delete the device completely.

trans-unit.source: Go to <link><linkText>Delete a device</linkText><title></title></link> for instructions.
trans-unit.target: Go to <link><linkText>Delete a device</linkText><title></title></link> for instructions.

trans-unit.source: Deactivate and retain data
trans-unit.target: Deactivate and retain data

trans-unit.source: If you are interested in deleting the device but want to retain the device data, then do the following:
trans-unit.target: If you are interested in deleting the device but want to retain the device data, then do the following:

trans-unit.source: Deactivate the device.
trans-unit.target: Deactivate the device.

trans-unit.source: All the volume containers and the snapshots of the device will remain.
trans-unit.target: All the volume containers and the snapshots of the device will remain.

trans-unit.source: Go to <link><linkText>Steps to deactivate</linkText><title></title></link> for instructions.
trans-unit.target: Go to <link><linkText>Steps to deactivate</linkText><title></title></link> for instructions.

trans-unit.source: You can now fail over the volume containers and the associated snapshots.
trans-unit.target: You can now fail over the volume containers and the associated snapshots.

trans-unit.source: For procedures, go to <link><linkText>Failover and disaster recovery for your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For procedures, go to <link><linkText>Failover and disaster recovery for your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: After deactivation and failover, you can delete the device completely.
trans-unit.target: After deactivation and failover, you can delete the device completely.

trans-unit.source: Go to <link><linkText>Delete a device</linkText><title></title></link> for instructions.
trans-unit.target: Go to <link><linkText>Delete a device</linkText><title></title></link> for instructions.

trans-unit.source: Steps to deactivate
trans-unit.target: Steps to deactivate

trans-unit.source: Use the following procedure to deactivate a device in preparation for deleting it.
trans-unit.target: Use the following procedure to deactivate a device in preparation for deleting it.

trans-unit.source: To deactivate a device
trans-unit.target: To deactivate a device

trans-unit.source: On the StorSimple Manager service Devices page, select the device that you wish to deactivate and, at the bottom of the page, click Deactivate.
trans-unit.target: On the StorSimple Manager service Devices page, select the device that you wish to deactivate and, at the bottom of the page, click Deactivate.

trans-unit.source: A confirmation message will appear.
trans-unit.target: A confirmation message will appear.

trans-unit.source: Click Yes to continue.
trans-unit.target: Click Yes to continue.

trans-unit.source: The deactivate process will start and take a few minutes to complete.
trans-unit.target: The deactivate process will start and take a few minutes to complete.

trans-unit.source: On a StorSimple virtual device, deactivation results in the following actions:
trans-unit.target: On a StorSimple virtual device, deactivation results in the following actions:

trans-unit.source: The StorSimple virtual device is removed.
trans-unit.target: The StorSimple virtual device is removed.

trans-unit.source: The OSDisk and Data Disks created for the StorSimple virtual device are removed.
trans-unit.target: The OSDisk and Data Disks created for the StorSimple virtual device are removed.

trans-unit.source: The Hosted Service and Virtual Network that were created during provisioning are retained.
trans-unit.target: The Hosted Service and Virtual Network that were created during provisioning are retained.

trans-unit.source: If you are not using these entities, you should delete them manually.
trans-unit.target: If you are not using these entities, you should delete them manually.

trans-unit.source: Cloud snapshots created by the StorSimple virtual device are retained.
trans-unit.target: Cloud snapshots created by the StorSimple virtual device are retained.

trans-unit.source: Delete a device
trans-unit.target: Delete a device

trans-unit.source: You can delete only those devices that have been deactivated.
trans-unit.target: You can delete only those devices that have been deactivated.

trans-unit.source: Deleting a device removes it from the list of devices connected to the service.
trans-unit.target: Deleting a device removes it from the list of devices connected to the service.

trans-unit.source: The service can then no longer manage the deleted device.
trans-unit.target: The service can then no longer manage the deleted device.

trans-unit.source: To delete a device
trans-unit.target: To delete a device

trans-unit.source: On the StorSimple Manager service Devices page, select a deactivated device that you wish to delete.
trans-unit.target: On the StorSimple Manager service Devices page, select a deactivated device that you wish to delete.

trans-unit.source: On the bottom on the page, click Delete.
trans-unit.target: On the bottom on the page, click Delete.

trans-unit.source: You will be prompted for confirmation.
trans-unit.target: You will be prompted for confirmation.

trans-unit.source: Click Yes to continue.
trans-unit.target: Click Yes to continue.

trans-unit.source: It may take a few minutes for the device to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: It may take a few minutes for the device to be deleted.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: To restore the deactivated device to factory defaults, go to <link><linkText>Reset the device to factory default settings</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: To restore the deactivated device to factory defaults, go to <link><linkText>Reset the device to factory default settings</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: For technical assistance, <link><linkText>contact Microsoft Support</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For technical assistance, <link><linkText>contact Microsoft Support</linkText><title></title></link>.
